alert.note: Alert for Major (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 8:31AM CDT until November 04 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 AM CDT FOR EASTERN ALFALFA...SOUTHWESTERN GRANT...NORTHWESTERN GARFIELD AND NORTHEASTERN MAJOR COUNTIES... At 831 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ringwood, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Helena, Pond Creek, Ringwood, Cleo Springs, Goltry, Meno, Jet, Nash, Hillsdale, Carrier, Jefferson and Great Salt Plains Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
